nodes.text: Lizards were a type of reptile. Some varieties of lizard could be found in the swamps of the planet Dagobah, including sleens while others dwelt on the planets Dathomir and Hissrich.
While living in exile on Dagobah, Jedi Master Yoda often found lizards crawling through the door of his hut and allowed them to stay and keep him company unless they were venomous.
